data.name: GraphologyTitle
data.value: Graphology applied to the business environment

data.name: GraphologySection1Title
data.value: What is it and how do I apply it?

data.name: GraphologySection1Text
data.value: Graphology is a technique that allows understanding personality traits through the analysis of handwriting. I use it as a complementary tool in selection processes and organizational diagnostics.

data.name: GraphologySection2Title
data.value: What do I analyze in a graphological profile?

data.name: GraphologySection2Text
data.value: From rhythm and pressure of the strokes to elements such as underlining the name, which may indicate a need for recognition or self-assertion depending on interpretations.

data.name: GraphologySection3Title
data.value: What is it used for in companies?

data.name: GraphologyList2
data.value: Help profile candidates in selection processes.

data.name: GraphologyList3
data.value: Identify strengths and areas of improvement in existing teams.

data.name: GraphologyList4
data.value: Provide a different perspective on cognitive and emotional styles.

data.name: GraphologySection4Text
data.value: To evaluate profiles, identify strengths, compatibilities, work styles, and improvement areas, both in candidates and established teams. It offers a deep perspective complementing other personal and professional assessment tools.
